results.rule_description: Public egress should not be allowed via network policies
results.impact: Exfiltration of data to the public internet
results.resolution: Remove public access except where explicitly required
results.description: Network policy allows egress to the public internet.

results.rule_description: Public ingress should not be allowed via network policies
results.impact: Exposure of infrastructure to the public internet
results.resolution: Remove public access except where explicitly required
results.description: Network policy allows ingress from the public internet.
